2+1.sig_info: For each Armor Up effect active, Ultron releases more Nano-Inhibitors, reducing his opponent's Offensive Ability Accuracy by 5 to 25% per stack.

PASSIVE: function Armor(3733.33 Armor Rating Increase, 8 seconds, every 15% Health lost)
function Evade(every 7 seconds)
Advanced robotics provides full immunity to Poison and Bleed effects.
Duckslug Editorial
Ultron gains an invisible evade charge 7 seconds after the fight starts. Ultron will not evade or expend the charge while stunned.
The charge will refresh 7 seconds after being used, and he cannot have more than one charge at a time.
This is different than Ultron Prime's evade, like Cat said.
BLOCKING: function Armor(25% chance, 84.21 rating increase, 15 seconds)
BASIC ATTACKS: function Radiation(30.71 Poison damage, 6.50 seconds, 19% chance)
SPECIAL ATTACKS: function Heal Block(remove all Poison effects, 1.50 seconds per Poison removed)
function Stun(40% chance, 3 seconds)
ALL ATTACKS: function Fury(20.75 attack increase, 6 seconds, every 5 attacks)
